headers.subject: Re: [Haskell-cafe] Converting IO [XmlTree] to [XmlTree]

body.para: Never answer such newbie questions with unsafePerformIO. That's the wrong answer 99.99% of the time, but giving it to a newbie they might follow your advice.
On Tue, Apr 14, 2009 at 5:01 PM, Cristiano Paris <frodo@theshire.org> wrote:

quote.quotepara: On Tue, Apr 14, 2009 at 4:54 PM, rodrigo.bonifacio <rodrigo.bonifacio@uol.com.br> wrote:
I guess this is a very simple question. How can I convert IO [XmlTree] to just a list of XmlTree?
That's an easy finding on Hoogle:
Anyhow, as the name suggest, the function is "unsafe", so you better know what you're doing.
